committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for the inclusion of members of the uniformed services and civilian employees of the Government assigned to posts of duty outside the United States, and their dependents, in censuses of population for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in Congress.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to ensure that no member of the armed forces, civilian employee of the United States, or dependent of such member or employee is excluded from any decennial census based on such member or employee being assigned to a post outside the United States.

titles.title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for the inclusion of members of the uniformed services and civilian employees of the Government assigned to posts of duty outside the United States, and their dependents, in censuses of population for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in Congress.
